name: Death Hit
description:
Death Hit

 - Death Hit is our first game. Its quite simple and not too complex.

 - The purpose of the game is too fight off what is called, The plagued with your mouse. There are no complex animations, all we aimed for was to see our players high scores.

 - This is a challenge to fast mouse clickers. We don't expect this game to take a while to beat.

Controls:

Left Mouse Click (on enemy) - Kill

Escape (during play) - Pause

Social Media:

reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/TheVidGamerDevs/

ps: Our next game we plan to be better and 3d. Please recommend in the comments if you want to see any updates to this game.
